questions: can i get my money back
refund_policy.answer: Currently, we do not offer refunds after booking confirmation. Please read the terms before booking.

questions: what can i do on this site
site_info.answer: This site helps you predict house prices and book properties.

developer_info.answer: This system was developed as part of a final year project by Reshma and Anisha.

questions: how can i book a house
what is the process to book a house
booking_help.answer: Go to the listings page, choose a house, and click on 'Book Now'.

price_features.answer: Features like area, number of rooms, location, and road access affect the price.

bot_name.answer: I am your real estate assistant bot.

help_offer.answer: Of course! I can help you with FAQs or predict house prices.

questions: how to use the price prediction feature
price_prediction_use.answer: Enter the details of the house in the form and click 'Predict Price'.

questions: what is the meaning of luxury house
luxury_meaning.answer: A luxury house typically has high-end features and amenities, such as a swimming pool, gym, and advanced security.

questions: what is the meaning of aana
aana_meaning.answer: Aana is a unit of area measurement used in Nepal, equivalent to 342.25 square feet.

contact_support.answer: You can contact support via the contact form on our website or email us at nemkulreshma8@gmail.com

questions: what is the logic behind price prediction
price_prediction_logic.answer: We estimate the price based on location, size, and other important features using a machine learning system.

questions: what types of properties are available
what kind of houses can I book
do you have different property types
property_types.answer: We offer various property types including apartments, villas, and commercial spaces.

questions: how do I confirm my booking
what happens after I book a house
booking_confirmation.answer: After booking, you will receive a confirmation email with all the details.

questions: can I view the house before booking
how to schedule a house viewing
house_viewing.answer: Yes, you can schedule a viewing by contacting us through the website.

questions: how can I pay for my booking
payment_methods.answer: We accept various payment methods including credit cards, bank transfers, and digital wallets.

questions: how do I cancel a booking
cancellation_policy.answer: Cancellations are allowed within 24 hours of booking. Please refer to our cancellation policy for details.

questions: do I need an account to book
how do I create an account
can I manage my bookings online
user_account.answer: Creating an account is optional but recommended for managing your bookings easily.

questions: do you have properties in my area
how can I find properties near me
property_location.answer: You can find properties by searching on our listings page based on your preferred location.

questions: how can I share my experience
customer_reviews.answer: Yes, you can leave a review after your booking is completed. We value your feedback!

questions: what features do the properties have
what should I know about the property features
property_features.answer: Each property listing includes detailed information about its features and amenities.

questions: how do you handle my data
privacy_policy.answer: We take your privacy seriously. Please read our privacy policy for details on how we protect your information.

questions: what are the terms of service
where can I find the terms and conditions
do you have a terms of service document
terms_of_service.answer: You can find our terms of service in the footer of our website or in the 'Terms' section.

questions: how often is the FAQ updated
do you add new questions regularly
can I suggest a question for the FAQ
faq_updates.answer: We update our FAQ regularly based on user feedback and common inquiries. Suggestions are welcome!

questions: how can I get help with technical issues
is there a tech support team
technical_support.answer: Yes, we have a technical support team available to assist you with any issues you may encounter.

questions: can I share my thoughts about the site
user_feedback.answer: We appreciate your feedback! You can share your thoughts through our contact form or email us directly.

questions: how do I check property availability
can I see which houses are free
property_availability.answer: You can check property availability on the listings page where each property shows its current status.

questions: what is the standard size for houses
house_size.answer: House size is typically measured in square feet or square meters. Each listing includes the dimensions.

questions: what are the current market trends
how is the real estate market doing
local_market_trends.answer: We provide insights on local market trends through our blog and reports section.

questions: what safety measures are in place
how do you ensure property security
safety_measures.answer: Properties often include security systems, gated access, and neighborhood watch programs.

questions: how do you address environmental concerns
do you consider sustainability in properties
environmental_impact.answer: We promote eco-friendly properties and sustainable practices in our listings.

questions: are there parks or recreational areas
community_features.answer: Many properties include access to community features like parks, gyms, and swimming pools.

questions: can I inspect the property before booking
how do I arrange a property inspection
property_inspection.answer: Property inspections can be arranged by contacting us. They are recommended but not mandatory.

questions: how can I finance a house purchase
house_financing.answer: We can connect you with financial institutions that offer mortgage and financing options.

questions: do I need insurance for the property
what type of insurance is recommended
can you help with property insurance
property_insurance.answer: Property insurance is recommended to protect your investment. We can provide information on insurance providers.

questions: what are the rules for property modifications
house_renovation.answer: Renovations are allowed with prior approval. Please check our renovation policy for details.

questions: can you tell me about the area
are there schools and shops nearby
neighborhood_information.answer: Each listing includes information about the neighborhood, including schools, shops, and amenities.

house_maintenance.answer: Maintenance responsibilities vary by property. Some include services, while others require owner management.

questions: can I upgrade the property features
how do I request property upgrades
property_upgrades.answer: Upgrades can be discussed with the property owner or management team. Please contact us for more information.

questions: what documents do I need to provide
which papers are necessary for booking
document_requirements.answer: You need to provide a valid citizenship card along with your phone number for booking.

questions: how to change my booking details
is it possible to update my booking
booking_modification.answer: Booking modifications are allowed up to 48 hours before the scheduled date. Please contact support for assistance.

questions: what happens if I pay late
is there a penalty for late payment
late_payment.answer: Late payments may result in cancellation of your booking. Please ensure timely payment to avoid issues.

house_insurance_options.answer: We can help connect you with insurance providers for property insurance.

questions: how often do you update listings
house_listing_updates.answer: Our property listings are updated daily to reflect the latest available houses.

questions: how to bargain for a house price
price_negotiation.answer: Price negotiation depends on the property owner. Contact us to discuss your offer.

questions: is my data safe on this site
site_security.answer: We use industry-standard security measures to protect your data.

questions: do you have a mobile app
is there an app for this service
can I use this on my phone
mobile_app.answer: Currently, we only have a website, but a mobile app is in development.

questions: how many bookings can I make
is there a limit on bookings
booking_limits.answer: There is no limit on the number of bookings you can make.

special_offers.answer: We periodically offer promotions. Subscribe to our newsletter to stay updated.
